kv13.8:1.3_0: Dukkhābhinandino sattā, atthi keci dukkhaṁ patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti, dukkhaṁ ajjhosāya tiṭṭhantīti?
kv13.8:1.5_0: nanu sukhābhinandino sattā, atthi keci sukhaṁ patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti, sukhaṁ ajjhosāya tiṭṭhantīti?
kv13.8:1.7_0: Hañci sukhābhinandino sattā, atthi keci sukhaṁ patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti, sukhaṁ ajjhosāya tiṭṭhanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv13.8:2.3_0: Dukkhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti, sukhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetīti?
kv13.8:2.5_0: nanu sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti, dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetīti?
kv13.8:2.7_0: Hañci sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti, dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anuseti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv13.8:3.5_0: “so evaṁ anurodhavirodhaṁ samāpanno yaṁ kiñci vedanaṁ vedayati sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā, so taṁ vedanaṁ abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
